alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 9:42AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Canon City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County and Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
